## 📅 December 02, 2025

### 🐟 Salmon In A Changing Climate
Improving our understanding of the long-term implications of climate change for Pacific Salmon and their ecosystems.

**Time:** 10AM-12PM  
**Location:** Pacific Science Enterprise Centre (PSEC), West Vancouver  
**Chair:** Patrick Thompson  
[Join Webinar](https://events.teams.microsoft.com/event/1f2df8a8-252e-47f7-8df1-a6096b1fa578@1594fdae-a1d9-4405-915d-011467234338){.btn .btn-primary}
